actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to establish a congressional internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson.

summary.text: Authorizes each Member, Delegate to, or Resident Commissioner in, the House of Representatives to hire for two months during the period from June 1 to August 31, inclusive, of each year during the Ninety-third Congress, one additional employee to be known as a Lyndon Baines Johnson teacher congressional intern. Makes the contingent fund of the House available to pay the expenses of transportation, by the most direct route, incurred by each Lyndon Baines Johnson teacher congressional intern for one round trip between the residence of such intern in the area (other than the District of Columbia) represented by the Member, Delegate, or Resident Commissioner concerned and Washington, District of Columbia.

titles.title: Resolution to establish a congressional internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson.
